Package org.ephman.abra.tools.plugins

Class Summary
ClassPluginData a class for plugins at the class level (ie View, Validator, Taglib)
FieldPluginData a class for plugins at the class level (ie View, Validator, Taglib)
GeneratorPlugin this class will describe the basics for adding a plugin to the abra generation framework callbacks when parsing xml for information storage and generation calls to run
PluginGeneratorHandler this class will accept callbacks when parsing xml for information storage and generation calls to run friend to MapToJava
 

Exception Summary
PluginDataException
